column5: Our 107-year-old home is full of charm! Close to TCU, Colonial CC, Will Rogers Memorial Center, downtown FW (2 miles) and within walking distance to the Hospital District (Baylor, Cook Children's, Texas Health (Harris) and JPS) and our beloved Magnolia Avenue restaurants, bars, concert venues and family-friendly activities - the Fort Worth Zoo is only 1 mile away! Families with kids, big groups, sports fans, rodeo contestants and furry friends (dogs) are welcome!
